price: Das Feuer schlägt in ihre Gesichter, und sie werden darin erblaßt sein.
arabic: تَلۡفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا كَٰلِحُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: talfaḥu wujūhahumu al-nāru wahum fīhā kāliḥūna
